meanings.definition: To make an explosive sound by forcing air through the nose.
meanings.sent1: The horse was snorting loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: She saw the dragon snorting fire in the movie.
meanings.sent3: The baby elephant was snorting bubbles in the water.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine was snorting and sputtering.
meanings.sent5: The steam train was snorting as it chugged along the tracks.

meanings.definition: To inhale a drug through the nose audibly.
meanings.sent1: He was caught snorting cocaine in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The addict was snorting heroin to get high.
meanings.sent3: The clown was snorting confetti instead of drugs.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was snorting the energy of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The magician was snorting glitter for his grand finale trick.

meanings.definition: An act or sound of snorting.
meanings.sent1: The snorting of the bull echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The snorting of the pig woke up the farmer.
meanings.sent3: The snorting of the cat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The snorting of the kettle signaled the water was boiling.
meanings.sent5: The snorting of the train announced its arrival at the station.
